name: space-meet
author: Julian Rosemann
description: Space Meet is a meeting space, where you can walk & talk. This is work in progress, it's only a proof of concept yet.

scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run tsc && yarn run babel && yarn run webpack && yarn run clean-build-steps
scripts.buildforce: yarn run clean && yarn run tsc ; yarn run babel && yarn run webpack && yarn run clean-build-steps
